com.cz3003.message

Class SMSMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cz3003.message.SMSMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SMSMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class defines the different type of messages that will be exchanged between the Clients and the Server. When talking from a Java Client to a Java Server a lot easier to pass Java objects, no need to count bytes or to wait for a line feed at the end of the frame
    Author:
    June and Jia De
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
